name: unendingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not stop, or seems to have no end: I do not have the patience that I once had to listen to people talk unendingly about their illnesses. Synonyms
ceaselessly
endlessly
extremely: It is unendingly sad you have lost your child in such a cruel way. Related word
unending
More examplesFewer examplesThe officer said the prisoner talked unendingly about his desire to move to a different part of the Camp.They believed that after God's judgment we shall be unendingly happy or unendingly miserable.He found the sport of cricket unendingly fascinating.It's one of the most tragic, unendingly upsetting, disturbing books I've ever read.
